Also try browsing the list of People, Policies, or Divisions.

Enter your postcode, MP name, electorate or debate topic:

Example: "2042", "Tony Abbott", "Bennelong" or "Medicare"

People: You can enter a postcode to get a list of all MPs for that electorate, or else enter their name or part of their name. If you don't know exactly how to spell the name, write it as best you can like it sounds.

Divisions: To find divisions you are interested in, enter the name of a subject, such as "Pensions" or "Hunting". They Vote For You will search the titles of the divisions and the text of the motion being debated. If you enter multiple words, it will only find entries where they appear next to each other as you enter them. You can enter part of a word.
